response.job_title: Commercial Project Manager | Financial Analyst | Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Planning and financial controlling of projects aimed at supplying of generation and high voltage transmission products.

Tender offers thought preparation, controlling and follow up of tender documents, commercial and payment terms during the negotiation phase.

Responsable for the financial management of projects, budget and expenditures controller and contractual negotiations responsable with customers and suppliers.

Monitoring of logistics processes for import and export of high voltage products.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Support for planning and financial controlling of projects aimed at supplying of generation and transmission products.

Support in tender offers thought preparation, controlling and follow up of tender documents, commercial and payment terms during the negotiation phase.

Assistance in the responsable team for the financial management of projects, budget and expenditures controller and contractual negotiations responsable with customers and suppliers.

Monitoring of logistics processes for import and export of high voltage products.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Analyst Intern

profile_positions.description:
Execution of comparative reports for the analysis of logistics costs in changes generated within the supply chain.
Development, monitoring and reporting of measures aimed at material control and reduction of costs associated with the supply chain through the use of tools such as VBA and Microsoft Access.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Analyst

education.field_of_study: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management

company.name: Siemens Energy
company.description:
Siemens Energy is one of the world’s leading energy technology companies. The company works with its customers and partners on energy systems for the future, thus supporting the transition to a more sustainable world. With its portfolio of products, solutions and services, Siemens Energy covers almost the entire energy value chain – from power generation and transmission to storage. The portfolio includes conventional and renewable energy technology, such as gas and steam turbines, hybrid power plants operated with hydrogen, and power generators and transformers. A majority stake in the wind power subsidiary Siemens Gamesa Renewable Energy (SGRE) makes Siemens Energy a global market leader for renewable energies. An estimated one-sixth of the electricity generated worldwide is based on technologies from Siemens Energy. Siemens Energy employs 93,000 people worldwide in more than 90 countries and generated revenue of around €29 billion in fiscal year 2022.

Siemens Energy is a trademark licensed by Siemens AG
